dt: {bc}a war cry especially of a Scottish clan
{bc}a word or phrase used to express a characteristic position or stand or a goal to be achieved
{bc}a brief attention-getting phrase used in advertising or promotion

et: alteration of earlier {it}slogorn{/it}, from Scottish Gaelic {it}sluagh-ghairm{/it}, from {it}sluagh{/it} army, host + {it}gairm{/it} cry
shortdef: a war cry especially of a Scottish clan
a word or phrase used to express a characteristic position or stand or a goal to be achieved
a brief attention-getting phrase used in advertising or promotion
